item.title: Activist Carronade spots a hidden gem in Viasat’s business. How the firm may unlock value
item.description: The activist investor appreciates Viasat's Defense and Advanced Technologies business, dubbing it a 'crown jewel' that may be due for a spinoff or IPO...

item.title: Crypto may be coming to 401(k) plans, but it’ll be a while before it’s easily accessible
item.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order meant to open retirement plans to alternative assets including cryptocurrencies.

item.title: These are the most overbought stocks in the market, including Apple and Alphabet
item.description: This week's list of most oversold stocks on Wall Street included Airbnb and The Trade Desk.

item.title: Goldman Sachs names five stocks with more upside following their latest earnings
item.description: Goldman Sachs revealed a quintet of stocks with more room to appreciate following their latest earnings reports.

item.title: August will be a down month for the stock market as growth slows, warns UBS' Garthwaite
item.description: The Wall Street firm believes the U.S. economic data is poised to continue to deteriorate, threatening the market's bull run.
